derivation: a primitive root; properly, to twist (compare H1434 (גְּדִל)), i.e.
strongs_def: to be (causatively make) large (in various senses, as in body, mind, estate or honor, also in pride)
kjv_def: advance, boast, bring up, exceed, excellent, be(-come, do, give, make, wax), great(-er, come to... estate, [phrase] things), grow(up), increase, lift up, magnify(-ifical), be much set by, nourish (up), pass, promote, proudly (spoken), tower.
